hero.aboutText: We are an online store offering construction sets with a unique theme inspired by the world of online games.
hero.productsText: We offer a wide selection of construction sets that recreate fascinating scenes from online games and casinos.

aboutHome.title: About Us - Your Store with Unique Construction Sets on Gambling Themes
aboutHome.desc: We are an online store offering construction sets with an original gambling theme. Our range is aimed at those who value unconventional solutions and want to enrich their gaming experience. We offer high-quality construction sets, designed with attention to detail, perfect for gambling enthusiasts and collectors.

aboutPage.item1: We are an online store offering construction sets with a unique gambling theme inspired by the world of online games.
aboutPage.item2: Our construction sets reflect the most popular themes from the world of online slots and casinos, such as slot online and casino online.
aboutPage.item3: We have thoroughly researched the market and noticed a strong interest in themed sets that combine the creative building process with elements of popular games.
aboutPage.item4: Our store was created for those who seek unconventional solutions and want to enrich their toy collections with creative sets. We offer high-quality, meticulously designed construction sets that will provide hours of exciting play for both children and adults.
aboutPage.item5: In our store, you will find creativity, quality, and innovation that align with the latest trends in the world of gambling and construction sets. We invite you to explore our offer and enjoy the pleasure of playing and building!
aboutPage.item6: Our products are a great choice for collectors and gambling enthusiasts who want to bring a part of their favorite games into the real world. We strive to regularly update our range, offering new themes and ideas, so our customers always have something new and exciting to choose from.

oferta.title: Our Services – Comprehensive Support at the Highest Level
oferta.desc: We offer a wide range of services, including comprehensive consultations on choosing the best construction sets tailored to your individual needs and preferences. Our priority is fast and reliable delivery, so you can enjoy your products as soon as possible. After your purchase, we provide full support, helping to resolve any questions or issues to make your shopping experience as satisfying as possible. Our goal is your satisfaction, not only with the products but also with the quality of our service.

ofertaPage.mainText: We offer a wide range of services, including consultations on choosing the best construction sets, fast delivery, and post-purchase support. We work to ensure you are satisfied not only with the products but also with our service. Our construction sets are popular among fans of online games, such as slot online and casino online, thanks to their unique themes.
ofertaPage.text1: We will help you choose the best construction set based on your interests and needs.
ofertaPage.text2: We ensure quick delivery of your order directly to your home.
ofertaPage.text3: We are always ready to provide assistance after purchase to address any questions.
ofertaPage.subText: Our construction sets are popular among fans of online games, such as slot online and casino online, thanks to their unique themes.

towary.cardDesc1: Build your own city casino with a unique snowboard arena. Create a modern gaming zone at the top of the building, where the adrenaline of snowboard competitions meets the excitement of casino games. Perfect for fans of urban adventures and extreme sports!
towary.cardDesc2: Move your casino to Prison Island! Build a secret casino in the middle of the sea, where dangerous prisoners can risk everything in thrilling games. Organize escapes, water chases, and action-packed adventures! Perfect for fans of extreme adventures and casino excitement.
towary.cardDesc3: Ensure safety in LEGO City by protecting the new casino! Build a police station and catch thieves trying to rob the casino. Use a helicopter, police cars, and security forces to capture the criminals and guarantee safety in the gaming zone!
towary.cardDesc4: Build a casino in a charming suburban house! Create a family-friendly casino where all family members can join the fun. The perfect combination of relaxation and gaming in a warm, homey atmosphere. Great fun for the whole family!
towary.cardDesc5: Build your own casino in the heart of the forest! Set up a gaming zone in a treehouse where nature meets exciting casino games. The perfect place for relaxation and entertainment away from the city, surrounded by greenery and fresh air!
towary.cardDesc6: Immerse yourself in the serene world of the Zen Casino, surrounded by lush vegetation and Japanese architecture. Build a unique place where the harmony of nature meets the excitement of casino games. Perfect for those seeking relaxation with a touch of gambling fun.
towary.cardDesc7: Build a majestic samurai castle where elite casino games take place. Discover secrets hidden within ancient walls and create a place where tradition meets modern casino entertainment. Perfect for history lovers and thrill-seekers!
towary.cardDesc8: Build an exclusive boutique hotel with a luxurious casino where wealth and opulence meet thrilling games. Design prestigious rooms and entertainment areas, attracting guests from around the world. The perfect place for relaxation and gaming in a luxurious setting.
towary.cardDesc9: Discover the mysterious underground casino in the world of Minecraft! Build structures full of challenges and risk, fight enemies, and collect treasures. Experience an exciting adventure where gambling meets the legendary game of Minecraft. Perfect for Minecraft fans and casino enthusiasts!
towary.cardDesc10: Build a powerful medieval castle where dangerously legendary casino games take place. Create dungeons full of challenges and hidden treasures, where knights and dragons fight for gold and glory. A casino in the world of dragons and knights awaits bold players!

rules.text1: These rules outline the terms of using the platform http://budowlanaonlinegame.com. Using our website implies acceptance of these terms. Please carefully review the rules before making any purchases.

rules.text3: The user agrees to use the platform in accordance with the law and the rules outlined in this document. The following actions are prohibited:
rules.text4: http://budowlanaonlinegame.com is not responsible for any damages resulting from improper use of its services by the user. In case of technical issues with the platform, the user must promptly report them to the website administrators.
rules.text5: We reserve the right to make changes to these terms at any time. All changes will be posted on this page and will take effect upon publication. Continuing to use the platform after changes have been made constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

warranty.text1: All products purchased from the online store http://budowlanaonlinegame.com come with a manufacturer's warranty. The warranty covers manufacturing defects and damage resulting from normal use. The warranty period depends on the specific product and is stated in its description on our website.
warranty.text2: If you discover a defect in the purchased product, please contact our customer service team immediately through the Contact page available at Contact.
warranty.text3: Customers have the right to return purchased goods within 14 days of receiving the shipment without providing a reason. To exercise the right of withdrawal, please contact our customer service team and complete the return form available on the website.
warranty.text4: The returned product must be in its original condition, in the original packaging, and show no signs of use. The return shipping cost is covered by the customer unless the return is due to our error (e.g., sending the wrong product).
warranty.text5: After receiving and inspecting the returned product, the refund will be processed within 14 business days. The refund will be made using the same payment method used by the customer at the time of purchase, unless otherwise agreed.
warranty.text6: If you wish to exchange the product for another one, please contact our customer service team. Product exchanges are possible if the ordered product is in stock. In such cases, the purchased item must be returned, and we will send the new product after receiving the returned item.
warranty.text7: For questions regarding warranties or returns, please contact our customer service team through the Contact page available at Contact. We are happy to answer any questions and assist with resolving any issues.
